attributes.action: We, the undersigned request the government investigate Volkswagen Audi Group
attributes.additional_details:
VAG refuse to admit the 'fix' affects performance, that they have lied to their customers and the worlds governments. 
The government should instruct the Department of Transport (DoT) to force VAG into ways to compensate their customers.

Review VAG fraudulent behaviour in relation to the so called 'emissions scandal'. Including the proposed 'fix' that Volkswagen fail to explain in detail.
attributes.background: Anecdotal evidence suggests the 'fix' does more damage than good. Many customers Have had there (EGR) valve fail on their vehicles post 'fix

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you want the Government to urge Volkswagen to compensate car owners, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/176508
